name: createTask
description: Create a new task with title and description

title.description: The title of the task to create

description.description: The detailed description of the task to create

title.description: The title of the task to delete

name: postToExternalApi
description: Make an HTTP POST request to an external API with bearer token authentication

endpoint.description: The API endpoint path (relative to the base URL configured in settings)

data.description: The data object to send in the POST request body

headers.description: Optional additional headers to include in the request (as JSON object)

name: getEventDetails
description: Get detailed information about an event using its event ID via GraphQL query

eventId.description: The numeric ID of the event to retrieve details for

name: executeGraphQLQuery
description: Execute a custom GraphQL query with optional variables

query.description: The GraphQL query string to execute

variables.description: Optional variables for the GraphQL query (as JSON object)
